--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"Questionnaire","id":"9e2d8003-71bb-41a7-8812-cfed49a540a6","url":"http://hl7.org/fhir/Questionnaire/3141","title":"Cancer Quality Forum Questionnaire x-codeSamples.label: cURL
javascript Axios

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: A code that corresponds to one of its items in the questionnaire

parameters.name: context-type
parameters.description: A type of use context assigned to the questionnaire

parameters.name: context-type-quantity
parameters.description: A use context type and quantity- or range-based value assigned to the questionnaire

parameters.name: context-type-value
parameters.description: A use context type and value assigned to the questionnaire

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The questionnaire publication date

parameters.name: definition
parameters.description: ElementDefinition - details for the item

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the questionnaire

parameters.name: effective
parameters.description: The time during which the questionnaire is intended to be in use

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: External identifier for the questionnaire

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Intended jurisdiction for the questionnaire

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Computationally friendly name of the questionnaire

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Name of the publisher of the questionnaire

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the questionnaire

parameters.name: subject-type
parameters.description: Resource that can be subject of QuestionnaireResponse

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The human-friendly name of the questionnaire

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The uri that identifies the questionnaire

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The business version of the questionnaire
